mapper.select: SELECT bcmID, brdID, kusID, content, cmtDate FROM brdComment WHERE brdID = #{brdID} ORDER BY cmtDate ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brdComment (bcmID, brdID, kusID, content, cmtDate) VALUES (brdComment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{brdID}, #{kusID}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM brdComment WHERE bcmID = #{bcmID} AND kusID = #{kusID}
